translation.en: Mike down, mike down. There you go, now go.
You'd think I'd never done this. Ready?
translation.zh: 你会觉得我没干过这个，准备好了？

translation.en: Come with us tonight as we travel along with--
translation.zh: 今晚请跟我们一起前往...

translation.en: You got a little hair thing. Hold on.
Come with us tonight as we paint the town red on The Night Shift.
translation.zh: 今晚请跟我们一起畅玩《The Night Shift》节目

translation.en: Sorry, a little off my A-game. I'll get there.
translation.zh: 对不起，有点不在状态很快好了

translation.en: That wasn't bad. The second part just seemed a little pushed, though.
translation.zh: 不算太糟，虽然第二部分好像有点急躁

translation.en: On tonight's Night Shift, we're in Los Angeles...
translation.zh: 今晚的《The Night Shift》节目我们来到洛杉矶

translation.en: ...traveling along with that special breed of hero we like to call...
translation.zh: 与一帮出众的英雄同游他们就是我们常说的…

translation.en: We should have come earlier. We could be going with them.
translation.zh: 我们该早点来的那就能跟他们一起去了

translation.en: Well, that's cool. You got it?
-Yeah, that's great. That was perfect. -We'll wait for them to get back.
translation.zh: -拍到了，很完美-我们等他们回来
-喜欢别人叫你鲍勃还是罗伯特？-鲍勃吧

translation.en: Tell us, Bob, what's a normal night here at the station?
translation.zh: 鲍勃，告诉我们消防站平常的夜晚是怎样的？

translation.en: ...but 85 percent of the calls we go out on are medical.
translation.zh: 我们接到的出勤电话中有百分之八十五是伤病事故

translation.en: It can be anything from chest pain to more serious things.
translation.zh: 从胸口痛到其它更严重的什么都有可能

translation.en: How do you handle that with ambulances and hospitals?
translation.zh: 怎么处理跟救护车和医院的关系？

translation.en: Most ambulances you see are fire department.
translation.zh: 你看到的大多数救护车都是消防局的

translation.en: And most firefighters are also paramedics.
translation.zh: 而且大多数消防员也是救护人员

translation.en: At least, that's the direction it's going.
One more question, something I'm sure we're all wondering:
translation.zh: 还有一个问题，肯定大家都想知道

translation.en: Do firefighters still slide down those fabulous poles?
translation.zh: 消防员还是从那些超酷的杆子上滑下来吗？

translation.en: Tell my mom I loved her.
I'm glad I didn't wear a skirt. That could really hurt your legs.
translation.zh: 真庆幸没有穿裙子那一定会弄疼你的腿

translation.en: Tell me, Bob, how do you get down when you're wearing a skirt?
translation.zh: 鲍勃，告诉我你穿裙子的时候怎么滑下来？

translation.en: That's what they wear under their, what, their turnouts.
translation.zh: 他们的装备下面就是穿这个

translation.en: -Can I do it one more time? -Sure.
-We're going to the dining hall. -All right.
-Couple of guys I want you to meet. -Cool.
These are the men you'll be shadowing. Wherever they go, you go.
translation.zh: 这是你要跟拍的人他们去哪，你就去哪

translation.en: Cool. Please, oh, please, finish eating. We'll talk after.
translation.zh: 好的，请把饭吃完，我们晚点聊

translation.en: -You should try some of the food. -Yeah, I'm game.
translation.zh: -你应该尝尝这些菜-好啊，我很有兴趣

translation.en: -Please finish eating. -We'll get you a plate.
translation.zh: -请先把饭吃完-我们给你个碟子吧

translation.en: Just maybe un-tuck your shirt and stick it up here.
translation.zh: 或者掀起T恤，把它拿到上面

translation.en: Elliot's been telling me I never give him enough B-roll...
translation.zh: 艾利特总说我给他的胶片不够

translation.en: ...so I'm just gonna shoot it all.
If you could keep from rubbing into the mike too much--
translation.zh: 能不能不要老是摩擦麦克风呢？
-不好意思，好的-不用管摄像机

translation.en: Can you say something? Give me a level?
translation.zh: 能说点什么吗？让我听听音量

translation.en: You can just pretend it's not there. Just talk free.
translation.zh: 假装它不存在，随便讲话就好

translation.en: Can you say something more compelling?
translation.zh: 能不能说点吸引人的话呢？

translation.en: I don't know what to say--
I mean, am I gonna have this thing on all the time?
translation.zh: 要一直带着这玩意儿吗？

translation.en: Yeah, just watch what you say. We'll hear everything.
translation.zh: 对，讲话小心点我们什么都听得到

translation.en: You're probably not allowed to swear on your station.
translation.zh: 消防站里应该不许骂人的吧

translation.en: No. We can cut most of it out.
translation.zh: 对，我们可以切掉那些镜头

translation.en: But it helps if you're not dropping F-bombs.
translation.zh: 但最好不要把国骂甩出来

translation.en: So if I was to call this guy an ass-monkey...
...that would be considered a swear too, right?
It's gonna be a long night.
Is this some sort of torture device when you don't get in your turnouts?
translation.zh: 你们不穿戴装备时拿它当刑具？

translation.en: -That's what it is. -Can you get it?
Yes. This is called a hook ladder.
We use this in the-- The firemen would use this--
So this was used in the '20s and the '30s.
...these are the rungs, and the hook at the end...
translation.zh: 这些是梯板，钩子在末端

translation.en: ...they would grasp onto one window and then pull themselves up.
translation.zh: 他们把它挂上窗户，然后拉自己上去

translation.en: And then when they got to that windowsill, they would hook it again.
translation.zh: 等他们爬到窗台，再把它往上挂

translation.en: Did you get the hook, Scott? You see this?
translation.zh: 斯考特，拍到钩子吗？看到没？

translation.en: Used in the '20s and '30s. They stopped using it around--
translation.zh: 二三十年代用的淘汰它的时间大概是…

translation.en: Replaced it with a regular ladder that extends?
translation.zh: 取代成可以延伸的普通梯子？

translation.en: They must have tiny feet. Those are little rungs.
translation.zh: 他们的脚一定很小，这些梯板好小

translation.en: Yeah. Firemen were a lot smaller back then.
translation.zh: 对，那时的消防员个子小很多

translation.en: The fires were bigger and they were smaller.
translation.zh: 火势更大，但他们个子更小

translation.en: -Don't tell captain we took this down. -I'm not gonna tell him I touched it.
translation.zh: -别告诉队长我们把它拿下来了-我不会告诉他我碰过它

translation.en: I wanna introduce you to somebody. This is Wilshire. Mark.
translation.zh: 我想介绍一个人给你认识这是威尔谢马克

translation.en: -Say hi. -Dog right out of the cartoons.
Well, there's a reason why the Dalmatians were in cartoons.
translation.zh: 动画片里总有斑点狗是有原因的

translation.en: The fire department has a great sense of tradition.
translation.zh: 消防局的传统意识很好

translation.en: Dalmatians got along well with horses.
translation.zh: 斑点狗跟马的关系很好

translation.en: Important when the fire trucks were horse-drawn.
translation.zh: 它们在消防车靠马拉的时代很重要
现在它们被当作吉祥物

translation.en: But what they're trained to do is run in and stop the traffic.
translation.zh: 但它们接受的训练是跑上路阻断交通

translation.en: That's what I do, I run out there. Sort of like what a siren does today.
translation.zh: 我就是干这个的跑到街上，跟警报器似的

translation.en: Okay, well, Wilshire can show you what to do in case you catch on fire.
translation.zh: 威尔谢能向你演示着火了要怎么办

translation.en: So let's just pretend you're 5 years old and on fire.
translation.zh: 现在假设你五岁，并着火了
-我着火了-威尔谢会教你怎么做

translation.en: You're not gonna be on fire.
So it's stop, drop and roll, in case you catch on fire. Wilshire.
translation.zh: 万一着火，停下脚步倒地滚，威尔谢

translation.en: -Yeah, you know, have some fun. -You all hang out a lot?
translation.zh: -大家开心一下-你们经常一起玩吗？

translation.en: Yeah, we definitely live together. Close quarters.
translation.zh: 简直就是住一起，隔得非常近

translation.en: ...so we have everything we need in this place...
translation.zh: 所以这里有我们所需的一切

translation.en: ...from, you know, a small gym to this handball court.
translation.zh: 从小型健身房到手球场

translation.en: Sir, you got a call on the office line.
translation.zh: 长官，办公室有你的电话

translation.en: Can you pick up a call on the office line?
translation.zh: 能接听办公室线路的电话吗？

translation.en: -I was hoping we'd get a call. -Yeah.
Not a big one, a little call so we can see action.
translation.zh: 不用太严重的小事故就好，看看他们行动

translation.en: Gotta be annoying when trying to finish a game.
Every time, you know, we go respond to a call...
translation.zh: 我们每次接到警报出勤

translation.en: Depending on which side you're on, it's sort of nice.
translation.zh: 取决于你处于哪一方，这样挺不错的

translation.en: Works in your favor from time to time?
Not in my favor. What are you talking about?
I think I'd roller-skate if I had access to this.
translation.zh: 如果我有权使用它，我会玩滚轴溜冰

translation.en: I can see you doing that. Yeah.
Okay, so this is where the men store their boots and turnouts.
translation.zh: 这里是我们存放靴子跟装备的地方

translation.en: The pole hole is over here.
-The pole hole. -Yeah, interesting name, I know.
Our viewers always like to see action...
translation.zh: 我们的观众总喜欢戏剧效果

translation.en: ...so maybe we should go into the locker room.
translation.zh: 或许我们可以去更衣室看看

translation.en: -Let's go in the locker room. -You got it.
-Right this way. -I was kidding, I was kidding.
Okay, towel up, guys. We got a female on deck.
translation.zh: 大伙把毛巾裹上，有女士进来啦

translation.en: That's Griffin. He can't sing very well.
translation.zh: 这是格林芬，他唱歌不是很好听

translation.en: He's got one major talent, so come this way.
translation.zh: 但他有一个大天赋，来这儿

translation.en: -He's got a huge talent. -We're not using this.
translation.zh: -他有一个超大的天赋-这些镜头不能用

translation.en: Here. We have different hoses at the station, and this is the Griffin hose.
translation.zh: 消防站有各种不同的软管这是格林芬软管

translation.en: You know, I hope that's a wide-angle lens.
This is adding a whole new meaning to the term fireman's hose.
translation.zh: 给消防员的软管注入了全新的解释

translation.en: I understand why there are no women here.
translation.zh: 我明白这里为什么没女人了
-有很多女性消防员的-这个站？

translation.en: Okay, I think I can be a firefighter.
translation.zh: 我想我可以成为消防员

translation.en: -Yeah, it's a lot harder than it seems. -Keep the door closed.
translation.zh: -做起来比看上去难多了-把门关上

translation.en: You know what? Pick something you're good at.
translation.zh: 这样吧，你们选一样自己擅长的

translation.en: I bet you $10 I can do it better. You all can be my witnesses.
translation.zh: 我赌十块钱我能做得更好你们都可以当证人

translation.en: I think we're done here. We got everything we need.
translation.zh: 我想可以结束了，需要的都拍到了

translation.en: Did you know you were gonna be on camera?
translation.zh: 你们知道自己会拍下来吗？

translation.en: -Ten bucks. -You can't be in the way.
I'm just saying. You guys ready?
translation.zh: 我只是说，你们准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Yes. You owe her 10 bucks, man. -Ten dollars.
Just waiting on something to happen.
You wanna go back outside? See what they're up to?
translation.zh: 你想出去吗？看看他们在干嘛

translation.en: I think they're talking about you.
Will you turn up his mike?
translation.zh: 可以调大他的麦克风吗？

translation.en: You didn't catch no eye. Here, give me some of that.
translation.zh: 你没引起人家注意，嘿，把那个给我

translation.en: A hundred bucks says I can bang her by the morning.
translation.zh: 一百块，赌我天亮之前一定跟她上床

translation.en: -Sorry, what? -I said you missed a spot.
Oh, I know how to hit the spot. Don't you worry about that.
translation.zh: 我知道怎么找准地方，别担心这个

translation.en: I'll hold your camera. You go kick his ass, okay?
translation.zh: 我帮你拿着摄像机，你去抽他好吗？

translation.en: That's how you do pick and roll.
Oh, yeah? Is that how you do it?
He'll show you how to do it later.
...and the firefighters take turns sleeping in these rooms here.
translation.zh: 消防员轮流在这些房间睡觉

translation.en: But if the alarm rings, they can be up and on the truck in under one minute.
translation.zh: 如果警报响起他们要在一分钟内起床上卡车

translation.en: It's like my college dorm without the pink.
translation.zh: 除了不是粉色，很像我的大学宿舍

translation.en: Looks like you got your call.
-We're going to the pole hole. -Come on, come on.

translation.zh: 我拿着摄像机滑不下去

translation.en: Come here, come here, come this way.
Careful, okay? We have to get on that truck.
What kind of call is this?
-Okay. -We'll find out when we get there.
You seem to have kept shooting.
Most little girls wanna be ballerinas or princesses when they grow up.
translation.zh: 大多数小女孩都希望自己长大后成为芭蕾舞演员或公主

translation.en: I used to tell my mom, "Someday, I'm gonna grow up and be a fireman."
translation.zh: 我却经常对我妈妈说等我长大了我要当消防员

translation.en: Tonight, I am truly living the dream.
translation.zh: 今晚，我真的实现了梦想

translation.en: It's so loud, I don't think we can use any of it.
translation.zh: 太吵了，可能全都用不上

translation.en: Scott, I am still living the dream.
All right, we got a eight at 3 o'clock.
Keep calling out numbers. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你一直在说数字，是什么意思？
他其实是第三代工程师

translation.en: ...but I have the most important job.
No, I'm in charge of the chick-o-meter.
translation.zh: 不，我负责给女孩儿打分

translation.en: When I see a girl, I rate them.
translation.zh: 看到一个女孩，我就评一个分数

translation.en: So if I say there's a eight at 3 o'clock...
translation.zh: 如果我说三点钟方向八分

translation.en: ...the guys know they better look to the right.
You know, it's really funny. I always thought firemen were so dignified.
translation.zh: 真好玩，我一直以为消防员是很高尚的

translation.en: Oh, no, no. I signed up for brave and courageous.
translation.zh: 不，我的签约条件是勇敢不怕死

translation.en: -I don't do dignified. -Yeah, I think we get that by now.
translation.zh: -高尚可算不上-我想现在大家都知道了
我看到两点钟方向有九分

translation.en: It's called a chick-o-meter, not a dick-o-meter.
translation.zh: 是给女孩儿评分，男的不算

translation.en: You're fired. You can't talk anymore.
So where do you think the problem is?
Do you think it's over there, around the corner?
To the core, baby. To the core.
What are you taking with you?
Really anything we might need to break a lock or open a door.
translation.zh: 用来砸锁或开门的任何东西

translation.en: -You're the one who called this in? -Yeah.
I didn't know they made them that new.
Police are here. Might be more serious than we thought.
translation.zh: 警察已经来了可能情况比我们想象的要严重

translation.en: A woman was screaming bloody murder up there.
translation.zh: 一个女人在楼上叫得像杀人一样

translation.en: -It's Mrs. Espinoza. -Two cops are up there.
translation.zh: -是伊斯宾诺莎太太-两个警察上去了

translation.en: -When did they get here? -Five minutes ago.
translation.zh: -他们什么时候到的？-五分钟前
-那是什么声音？-这栋楼的声音
-他坚持要安装所有东西-温达，别说了

translation.en: -Go back to your apartments. -We heard screams.
translation.zh: -回你们的公寓-我们听到尖叫

translation.en: Well, at least get out of the way.
-Are they with you? -Yeah. They're shadowing us.
translation.zh: -他们跟你们一起的？-他们跟拍我们

translation.en: I tell you not to film something, don't film it.
-I tell you to get lost, you get lost. -No problem.
Here on the second floor on the right. It's an old woman, lives alone.
translation.zh: 二楼的右边一个老妇人独自居住

translation.en: Probably fell. Neighbors heard screams, called it in.
translation.zh: 可能遭到袭击，邻居听到尖叫，报了警

translation.en: You wouldn't believe the way she screamed. It was crazy.
translation.zh: 你想不出她尖叫的声音，像疯了一样

translation.en: Neighbors say she's weird. Doesn't talk to anybody.
translation.zh: 邻居说她是个怪人，不跟任何人说话

translation.en: -I told them not to get in the way. -Great. That's all we need.
translation.zh: -我叫他们不要妨碍我们-太好了，我们就想要这个

translation.en: Hello, ma'am, can you hear me? It's L.A.P.D.
translation.zh: 你好，太太，能听到我吗？我是洛杉矶警局的

translation.en: I'm here with paramedics. We're gonna come in to help you.
translation.zh: 我跟医务人员一起，我们会进来帮你

translation.en: If you're near the door, I need you to move away from it.
translation.zh: 如果你在门附近，请你离远一些

translation.en: -Hey, I got the keys. -Then get in here, sir. Come on.
translation.zh: -我有钥匙-那拿过来，先生，来吧

translation.en: Just a second. Yeah, here we are.
-I'm gonna do an intro. -Yeah, you're good.
translation.zh: -我要介绍一下-好，你可以说了

translation.en: Okay. We're standing outside an elderly woman's apartment.
translation.zh: 好的，我们正站在一个老妇人的公寓外
她的邻居听到尖叫于是打了911

translation.en: The fire department's about to begin the rescue.
Police say that she lives alone, she's not very social--
translation.zh: 警察说她独自居住，不太合群

translation.en: I need you to get back, brother, please, this time.

translation.zh: -她叫什么名字？-伊斯宾诺莎太太

translation.en: There's no need to worry, Mrs. Espinoza. We're here to help you.
translation.zh: 伊斯宾诺莎太太不用担心，我们是来救你的

translation.en: It's all right, is there anybody else in the apartment? Any more animals?
translation.zh: 没事了，公寓里还有其他人吗？还有别的动物吗？

translation.en: It's all right. It's all right.
We're gonna get you some medical help.
No, are you okay? Are you okay, ma'am?
You're gonna be okay. You're gonna be okay, all right?
Hey, chief, we're gonna need an ambulance here.
translation.zh: 头，我们需要一辆救护车

translation.en: Mrs. Espinoza, it's all gonna be all right.
translation.zh: 伊斯宾诺莎太太一切都会好起来的

translation.en: All right, I just need you to calm down, okay?
translation.zh: 我只需要你冷静下来，好吗？

translation.en: It's all right. Nobody's here to hurt you.
translation.zh: 没事的，这里没人会伤害你

translation.en: We can't help you unless you calm down.
translation.zh: 你不冷静下来我们帮不了你

translation.en: -An ambulance is on its way right now. -All right.
Danny, get everybody out of here until the ambulance gets here.
translation.zh: 丹尼，救护车来到之前让所有人出去

translation.en: Get her off. Get off. Get her off.
Get him on the floor. Get him on the floor.
No. We are not moving him.
-We are waiting for the ambulance. -Do you see an ambulance?
translation.zh: -我们在等救护车-你看到救护车了吗？

translation.en: We have to get him downstairs.
-All right. Come on, come on. Okay. -Grab the arm.
Come on. Come on, I got it.
I got her. I got her.
-Get the fuck out of the way. -Go, Scott.
Come on, let's go, let's go.
-Be careful down the stairs. -Hang in there, buddy.
Tape everything, you hear me? Tape everything.
translation.zh: 全部拍下来听到没有？全部拍下来

translation.en: -What do you mean? -They won't let us out.
translation.zh: -你什么意思？-他们不让我们出去了

translation.en: Something is closing it from outside.
Open the door. Open the door.
Is there a doctor in the house?
-Put some pressure on that wound. -Give me that rag.
translation.zh: -压住他的伤口-把那块布给我

translation.en: Why are they locking if there's a fire?
translation.zh: 如果着火了，他们干嘛锁门？

translation.en: There's no fire, Wanda. There is no fire.
We have an officer down. We have an officer down.
I need an ambulance immediately. I need backup.
translation.zh: 我们需要救护车，我需要后援

translation.en: I have a fucking hurt officer here.
translation.zh: 这里有一个警察伤得很重

translation.en: What's going on? Hey, what's happening?
I know no more than you do right now.
translation.zh: 现在我知道的不比你们多

translation.en: My partner's on the floor bleeding.
translation.zh: 我的搭档正躺在地上流血

translation.en: We are working hard to get you out of the building.
translation.zh: 我们正努力尝试把你们送出大楼

translation.en: This will all be over shortly.
-What will all be over? -What's going on?
translation.zh: -什么很快就会结束？-发生了什么事？

translation.en: Why are we locked in our building?
translation.zh: 我们为什么被锁在大楼里？

translation.en: Be calm. That's what that means.
Please remain calm and everything's-- Get the camera out of here.
translation.zh: 请保持冷静，一切都会…把摄像机拿开

translation.en: Don't touch the camera. We have every right to shoot.
translation.zh: 别碰摄像机，我们有权力拍摄

translation.en: -I'm tired of the camera. -People need to see what's going on.
translation.zh: -我烦透了摄像机-人们需要知道这里发生了什么

translation.en: I'm in charge here. Turn it off--
translation.zh: 这里我说了算，我叫你关掉它

translation.en: If you were, you'd be worried about getting your partner out.
translation.zh: 如果你说了算你应该操心怎么送你搭档出去
而不是我们有没有在拍摄

translation.en: You are two steps from being arrested, okay?
translation.zh: 你还差两步就可以被逮捕了

translation.en: This man will bleed to death.
translation.zh: 这个男人会流血而死的

translation.en: Everybody stop fighting, okay? Stop fighting.
translation.zh: 大家都别吵了，好吗？别吵了

translation.en: We need to get this man out of here.
translation.zh: 我们得把这个男人送出去

translation.en: -What's behind that door? -That's a fabric workshop.
translation.zh: -那扇门后面是什么？-是个纺织车间

translation.en: -Is there a way out from there? -Yeah, through the back. Come, come.
translation.zh: -从那里可以出去吗？-可以，从后面，过来

translation.en: You're not helping the situation. Okay?
translation.zh: 你这样对问题一点帮助没有知道吗？

translation.en: My husband's outside. Said there are cops.
translation.zh: 我老公在外面，说有很多警察

translation.en: Blocked off the street. He was getting antibiotics.
translation.zh: 他们封锁了街道，他被注射了抗生素

translation.en: -Don't move him. -No, we have to, we have to.
All right, he's still got a pulse.
Get the vet over here. Get the vet now.
He's still got a pulse. Take care of him.
All right. Come with me, let's go.
Come on, come on. You two stay here, all right?
Keep an eye on my partner, please.
The sound's coming from in there.
What are you two doing here? Get the camera back.
translation.zh: 你们两个在这儿干嘛？把摄像机收起来

translation.en: We need to get you guys out of here.
Ma'am, listen to me. Can you hear me, Miss Espinoza?
translation.zh: 太太，听我说伊斯宾诺莎太太，能听到吗？

translation.en: I need you to stay right where you are, okay?
translation.zh: 我要你呆在原地不动，好吗？

translation.en: All right? We wanna help you here.
Put your hands in the air for me, Mrs. Espinoza.
translation.zh: 伊斯宾诺莎太太，把手举起来

translation.en: Okay? Put your hands in the air.
Put the gun down. Let's go.
-You saw that, right? -Yeah, I saw it.
Let's just get downstairs. Let's get downstairs.
-Look, don't worry. I got it. -I said show it to me!
translation.zh: -别担心，我拍了-我说让我看看

translation.en: -What the hell was that? -I don't know. I think--
We should probably just get down the stairs, okay?
I know, I know, I know.
-Oh, my God. -We just have to get downstairs.
I need you to open up the door.
Fire department. We need everyone to gather downstairs in the atrium.
translation.zh: 消防局，我们要全部人走到楼下的前厅集合

translation.en: Yes, we need you to go downstairs.
-Was there a fire? -No, it's just a precaution.
Look, we just need you to get downstairs.
translation.zh: 我们只是需要你们下楼

translation.en: Does this have anything to do with the cable being out?
translation.zh: 这跟电视信号中断有关吗？

translation.en: -Come on, let's go. -What? Wait, wait, wait.
-What if I don't wanna go? -Then I'd be forced to force you.
translation.zh: -如果我不想走呢？-那我只好强迫你了

translation.en: Hi. I'm with the fire department.
We need everyone to gather in the atrium.
translation.zh: 我们需要所有人到前厅集合

translation.en: Okay, we need everybody downstairs, so....
translation.zh: 好吧，我们需要所有人下楼

translation.en: All right, there's people down there, and we need you two to go there.
translation.zh: 有人下去了，我们要你们俩也下去

translation.en: Ma'am, I'm with the fire department.
We need you to quickly and calmly walk down to the lobby, please.
translation.zh: 我们需要你冷静迅速的走到大厅

translation.en: Ma'am, we need you to get downstairs, okay?
translation.zh: 太太，我们需要你下楼，好吗？

translation.en: -I don't know that that's a good idea. -She needs help.
translation.zh: -我不知道这个主意好不好-她需要帮助

translation.en: We're just taking you downstairs, okay, ma'am?
translation.zh: 太太，我们会把你送到楼下

translation.en: Holy shit. Did you see that?
That rat just totally came after me. Hey, did you see that?
translation.zh: 那老鼠居然向我冲过来，你看到没？

translation.en: -Oh, my God, look at Elise. -Somebody grab that chair.
translation.zh: -天啊，看伊莉斯-把椅子拿过来

translation.en: -What's wrong with her? -Set her down, set her down.
Can't stop the bleeding. Get him to a hospital. He's gonna die.
translation.zh: 我止不住血，得送他去医院，他会死的

translation.en: Stay here. I'm gonna check the exit.
translation.zh: 呆在这儿，我去出口看看

translation.en: No, no, wait. We are under strict orders--
We're under orders to stay in the hall. Help me.
Fuck your orders, all right? My friend's dying!
translation.zh: 去你的命令，我朋友快死了

translation.en: -Didn't catch that. You're breaking up. -Two people have died.
translation.zh: -听不到，信号中断了-两个人死了

translation.en: Two others are in need of medical care. Police have blocked off the exit.
translation.zh: 另外两个急需治疗警察封锁了出口

translation.en: They've given us no explanation. We're trying to find a way out.
translation.zh: 他们什么解释都不给我们我们要想办法出去

translation.en: You need to remain in the building.
Attention, please. Do not try to leave the building.
translation.zh: 请注意，不要尝试离开大楼

translation.en: All exits have been sealed. Just stay calm.
translation.zh: 所有出口都已封锁，请保持冷静

translation.en: We will send someone in there shortly to assess the situation.
translation.zh: 我们很快会派人进来评估状况

translation.en: What are we supposed to do?
-What are we supposed to do? -Just wait.

translation.zh: 那里有五个人，发生了什么事？

translation.en: No, you're not getting my question.
I'm asking why they're calling this a BNC.
translation.zh: 我问他们为什么把这里称为BNC

translation.en: Why is the phone breaking? Why is it not working?
translation.zh: 为什么电话坏了，为什么用不了了

translation.en: What's a BNC? What is it?
A biological, nuclear or chemical threat.
-It's more common than you think. -Supposed to be reassuring?
translation.zh: -比你们想的要寻常-可以放心吗？

translation.en: Our cell phones don't work. Neither do the TVs or our radios.
translation.zh: 我们的手机不能用了电视跟收音机也是

translation.en: -Why are they isolating us? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -他们干嘛隔离我们？-我不知道
我联系不到我老公，我女儿还发烧了
-她得了什么病？-他们拿枪指着我们

translation.en: You can't keep us trapped here.
translation.zh: 你不能把我们困在这里

translation.en: We are all trapped in here. Step over here.
There might be-- From the office on the second floor, there is an overhang.
translation.zh: 从二楼的办公室出去，有一个悬梯

translation.en: Maybe we can use to jump down to the patio.
translation.zh: 或许我们可以通过它跳到天井里

translation.en: I don't want anyone knowing we're in here.
translation.zh: 我不想任何人知道我们在这里

translation.en: --go to the right side and jump.
It's only two and a half meters.
Can you see me? Can you see me?
-What are you doing? -We have a film crew in here.
translation.zh: -你在干什么？-这里有拍摄工作人员

translation.en: Tell your boss we have a TV crew in here.
translation.zh: 告诉你的老板，拍电视的人在里面

translation.en: We are filming this. Please, wait.
translation.zh: 我们在拍这个，求你了，等等

translation.en: People are gonna see what you're doing to us.
translation.zh: 人们会看到你们怎么对我们

translation.en: -Why can't we go out? -People are gonna see this.
translation.zh: -我们为什么不能出去？-人们会看到的

translation.en: What are you doing in here?
-You knew about this, didn't you? -Knew what?
That they're sealing us in here.
translation.zh: 他们会把我们关在里面

translation.en: I don't know anything and don't you fucking put your hands on me again.
translation.zh: 我什么都不知道，你他妈把手拿开
我什么都不知道，行了吗？
把这该死的摄像机拿开

translation.en: We need to show people what's going on here.
translation.zh: 我们要让世人看看这里发生了什么

translation.en: -Only proof we have. -Don't you get it?
You're locked in here like us. You think they give a shit about you?
translation.zh: 你跟我们一样被关在这里你以为他们会在乎你吗？

translation.en: -Let's all just calm down, all right? -Shut up.
This thing is getting to all of us.
No one here is gonna hurt you, okay?
We're trying to get out. That's all we're trying to do.
translation.zh: 我们想出去，这是我们唯一试图做的事

translation.en: I was just freaked out. Let's go.
Grab his legs, okay? Come on, let's go.
What we'll do is we'll roll him on his side.
translation.zh: 我们要把他翻到他的另一边

translation.en: We just have to be really careful.
It's 1:37 in the morning, and everyone is scared.
translation.zh: 现在是凌晨一点三十七分所有人都很害怕

translation.en: They've given us no information, cut off communication...
translation.zh: 他们不给我们任何信息切断了交流工具

translation.en: ...from walkie-talkies and cell phones to the building's cable and Internet.
translation.zh: 从对讲机和手机从大楼的电视信号跟网络

translation.en: The people trapped here, myself included...
translation.zh: 被困的人，包括我自己在内
不好意思，你是泰伦斯对吧？

translation.en: Listen, I've got a ton of Vicodin in my apartment, if that will help.
translation.zh: 听着，我的公寓有很多维柯丁或许能帮上忙

translation.en: I'll just-- I'll grab a bunch of stuff.
I basically got a pharmacy up there.
translation.zh: 基本上我在上面有个药房

translation.en: You can't arrest me for that, because of self-incrimination--
translation.zh: 你不能因此逮捕我因为我属于自证其罪

translation.en: Sir, you are the least of my worries right now, okay?
translation.zh: 先生，现在我没功夫操心你的事，好吗？

translation.en: Do what you're gonna do, please.
You ever seen anything like this before?
translation.zh: 你以前见过这种状况吗？

translation.en: No, I've never seen anything like this.
I don't usually treat people. Dogs and cats, mostly.
translation.zh: 我一般不医人，多数是医猫狗

translation.en: All I can really do is I can dress their wounds and try to comfort them.
translation.zh: 我能做的也就是缝合伤口试着缓和他们的痛苦

translation.en: How are the injured men doing?
They both lost a lot of blood, and the fireman over here...
translation.zh: 都失血过多，这个消防员

translation.en: ...he's got a bunch of broken bones and probable internal bleeding.
translation.zh: 有多处骨折，可能还有内出血

translation.en: Apparently, Mrs. Espinoza attacked and bit them in some kind of a fit.
translation.zh: 显然是伊斯宾诺莎太太什么病发作了，于是暴起咬人

translation.en: But honestly, I find that a little hard to believe...
translation.zh: 不过说实话，我觉得一个老女人

translation.en: ...that an old lady could do something like this to two grown men.
translation.zh: 对两个成年男子做出这种事太不可思议了

translation.en: Briana, that's a very pretty name. How old are you, Briana?
translation.zh: 布林安娜，这个名字真好听你多大了，布林安娜？

translation.en: With my mom and my dad and my dog, Max.
translation.zh: 跟妈妈，爸爸还有狗狗麦克斯

translation.en: Max. I haven't met Max. Where is he?
translation.zh: 麦克斯，我没见过麦克斯，他在哪？

translation.en: My dad took him to the vet because he's sick.
translation.zh: 它病了，爸爸带它去看兽医

translation.en: -She's had it for weeks, it's not like-- -You know what?
translation.zh: -她病了几个星期了，不像是…-不好意思

translation.en: If you don't mind, I'd like to keep you quiet while I interview Briana.
translation.zh: 如果你不介意我在采访布林安娜的时候请别说话

translation.en: It confuses the audience when people talk from off-camera.
translation.zh: 镜头以外的人说话会让观众觉得混乱

translation.en: -Oh, God, I'm sorry. -No, no, it's okay.
Yeah, I don't like being sick either.
Briana, you're a very brave girl...
translation.zh: 布林安娜，你是个勇敢的女孩儿

translation.en: ...and I'm really happy we got a chance to meet.
translation.zh: 我真的很高兴有机会认识你

translation.en: She's been fearless since she was little.

translation.zh: 她是个非常坚强的孩子

translation.en: Why don't you just start by introducing yourselves?
Well, I'm Ber-- I'm Bernard. This is my roommate, Sadie.
translation.zh: 我是巴纳德，这是我的室友塞迪

translation.en: And how long have you lived in the building?
translation.zh: 你们在这栋楼住了多久了？

translation.en: I've been here two and a half years.
And what do you do for a living?
Sadie's my best student, my protégé.
translation.zh: 塞迪是我最棒的学生，我的徒弟

translation.en: Where the hell is the doctor?
I got him, got him, got him.
Hold him, hold him. Hold his neck, hold his neck.
-Hold it over, hold his neck. -Go, go, go.
Oh, my God, is he still alive?
Hold him still, hold him still. He's gonna go down.
translation.zh: 扶好他，扶好他，他就快倒了

translation.en: No, no, stay here, stay here. No, the dog will come back.
translation.zh: 不，呆在这儿，那只狗会回来的

translation.en: -Okay, I have to show you something. -What?
Have to show you something. Just a sec.
translation.zh: 我必须给你看样东西，等等

translation.en: I think I know what this is.
Her tear ducts and salivary glands are constantly flowing.
translation.zh: 她的泪腺和唾液腺不停分泌

translation.en: She seems to be unable to swallow or speak.
translation.zh: 好像她不能吞咽和说话了

translation.en: She has a fever, she's confused.
She has some degree of paralysis and delirium.
translation.zh: 还有一定程度的瘫痪和神经错乱

translation.en: Never seen it in humans, but I know what rabies look like.
translation.zh: 从没见过染上这病的人但我知道狂犬病是怎样的

translation.en: Are you trying to tell me these people have rabies?
translation.zh: 你想告诉我这些人染了狂犬病？

translation.en: Tears, saliva, fever. They have what she has.
translation.zh: 眼泪，唾液，高烧他们跟她的症状一样

translation.en: But here's the thing. Rabies takes months for symptoms to show.
translation.zh: 但问题是染了狂犬病要好几个月之后才会出现症状

translation.en: This is taking minutes. I mean, rabies never acts this fast.
translation.zh: 现在才过了几分钟狂犬病发作从来不会这么快

translation.en: How does rabies spread? Through bites?
translation.zh: 狂犬病怎么传播的？通过咬伤吗？

translation.en: No, it's passed through anything wet. Blood, saliva, any mucous membrane.
translation.zh: 不，基本上是通过任何湿润的东西血液，唾液，黏膜

translation.en: So if you get their blood on you, you're okay.
translation.zh: 如果你碰到他们的血，你没事

translation.en: But if you get their blood on you...
...and it gets into a cut, into your mouth, eyes...
translation.zh: 进入一个伤口，进入你的嘴或眼睛

translation.en: People get shots in their stomach.
translation.zh: 我听说可以对染病的人做腹部注射

translation.en: Once symptoms show, rabies is 100 percent fatal.
translation.zh: 一旦症状出现狂犬病是百分百致命的

translation.en: -Where are you going? Where? -I'm going up to my apartment.
translation.zh: -你要去哪儿？-我要回我的公寓

translation.en: -Why can't I go? -We gonna do this all night?
translation.zh: -我为什么不能上去？-说了整晚都要呆在下面

translation.en: -You know why? -Because it's not safe there.
translation.zh: -你知道为什么吗？-因为那里不安全

translation.en: Oh, yeah, because it's really safe down here.
It seems to me, if this is spreading, maybe we should separate...
translation.zh: 在我看来，如果这玩意儿会传染

translation.en: ...instead of sitting here in a big group.
translation.zh: 或许分开比大家坐成一团的好

translation.en: I have a God-given right to protect myself as I see fit, so you know what?
translation.zh: 我看到了那些发病的人我有天赐权力保护我自己
-所以我回我的公寓去了-后退

translation.en: I'm gonna go and I'm gonna barricade the shit out of it.
translation.zh: 我要回去公寓，把那些鬼东西挡在外面

translation.en: -Where do you think they're going? -You can all sit here and rot.
translation.zh: -你觉得他们要去哪儿？-大家都坐在这儿等死吧

translation.en: Oh, you are so close to going to jail.
-Are you some kind of affirmative--? -You are so close to going to jail.
translation.zh: -你是不是很乐观…-你就快能进监狱了

translation.en: Look, this lets out right next to our apartment.
translation.zh: 这条路通向我们的公寓隔壁

translation.en: We wanna see if there's anything on the news about this.
translation.zh: 我们想看看新闻怎么说
-但是电视信号被切断了-信号？

translation.en: We still use rabbit ears on our TV.
translation.zh: 我们的电视还在用天线

translation.en: We're going with you. Wait, wait, wait, we're going with you.
translation.zh: 我们跟你们一起去，等等跟你们一起去

translation.en: It's just up here to the right.
We can't just open the door. We need something to hold the dog back with.
translation.zh: 我们不能打开门我们得挡住那条狗
-找个什么东西过来-有个灭火器

translation.en: Turn it off, Scott. Turn it off.
-Shouldn't we shut the door? -Close the door.
It usually takes a couple of seconds to....
No, I know what I'm doing.
Tell us why the CDC is entering the building.
translation.zh: 告诉我们为什么疾控中心要进入这座楼
为了防范，所有人都撤离了

translation.en: What the fuck is going on here?
Sadie, stay with me. Sadie, come here.
Stay with me. It cannot be.
-Stay with me. -You gotta close that door.
Angela, you have blood all over your shirt.
translation.zh: 安吉拉，你的衬衫上全是血

translation.en: I mean, I just killed something with my camera...
translation.zh: 我刚用摄像机杀了一个人

translation.en: -I'm with you, you're with me, okay? -Okay, okay, okay, we're here.
translation.zh: -我们俩一起承受，好吗？-好，好，我们在这儿

translation.en: We get out of here as fast as we fucking can, you hear me?
translation.zh: 我们要尽快离开这个鬼地方你听到吗？
-所有人都在吗？-还有最后一个

translation.en: All right, it's been a long, exhausting night for all of us...
translation.zh: 好了，对大家来说今晚是漫长又疲惫的一夜

translation.en: ...but we just got word from outside.
translation.zh: 但我们刚得到外面的消息

translation.en: Well, it's about bloody fucking time, isn't it?
Yes, they told me they're sending in the CDC.
Yes, but relax, it's fine. They're gonna come in.
translation.zh: 但放松点，没事的，他们会进来

translation.en: They're gonna run blood tests on residents to clarify things.
translation.zh: 给居民做血液测试以证实一些事情

translation.en: Everybody, so once they check it out...
translation.zh: 所有人，一旦他们检查完

translation.en: ...make sure everything's okay, we should be able to get out.
translation.zh: 确定所有人都没事我们就可以出去了

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -That doesn't work, not for rabies.
translation.zh: -你在说什么？-行不通的，验血是验不出狂犬病的

translation.en: -Nobody said anything about rabies. -I did, I told you it was rabies.
translation.zh: -没人说过是狂犬病-我说了，我告诉你那是狂犬病

translation.en: How do you test for rabies?
There's only one way. You gotta get a brain sample.
translation.zh: 只有一个办法，取大脑样本

translation.en: -What you have to do. -Let's make sure everyone's here.
translation.zh: -只能这样-让我们确定大家都在这儿

translation.en: Second floor, Unit A, that's where Mrs. Espinoza lives?
translation.zh: 伊斯宾诺莎太太住二楼A单元？

translation.en: All right, third floor, Unit A. Who's up there?
That's me, my daughter and my husband, who's been outside--
translation.zh: 我跟我女儿和老公，我老公在外面

translation.en: Yes, yes, yes, we know. Thank you.
-My wife and me. -Who's in Unit C?
-Fourth floor, Unit A, who's up there? -That was Elise. She's dead.
translation.zh: -四楼A单元，谁在那儿？-伊莉斯，她死了

translation.en: -4B, who's in B? -It's me, me, here.
They don't understand you. Them and her father.
translation.zh: 他们听不懂你说的话他们跟他爸住
-他爸还在楼上？-病了，他瘫痪了

translation.en: Maybe this is all his fault.
-How do you know? You don't know-- -Listen up, all right, let's finish up.
translation.zh: -你怎么知道？-听着，听我们点完

translation.en: What was I even gonna say? Who lives in the attic?
translation.zh: 我想说什么来着？谁住阁楼？

translation.en: A man from Boston. He rents it, but I haven't seen him in months.
translation.zh: 波士顿的一个男人他租的，不过我有几个月没见他了

translation.en: Wait, if her father's upstairs, should we bring him down?
translation.zh: 如果他父亲在楼上我们是不是该把他带下来？

translation.en: What if he's the cause? We can't bring sick people here.
translation.zh: 万一他是源头呢？我们不能把生病的人带下来

translation.en: -Your daughter's sick, isn't she? -She has fever. Hardly the same.
translation.zh: -你女儿也病了，是吗？-她发烧了，不是一回事

translation.en: Yeah, so we should bring her father downstairs.
translation.zh: 那我们就该把他父亲带下来

translation.en: -Listen. -How many times you gonna do this?
Nobody's going. We're gonna stay here.
translation.zh: 谁也不能走，我们都呆在这儿

translation.en: They'll let us know when they wanna move us, period.
translation.zh: 到了要撤离我们的时候他们会告诉我们

translation.en: -The cleaning lady was here. -I saw her this morning.
translation.zh: -清洁女工在这儿-我今天早上见过她
-让我看到你的手-洛杉矶警察局的

translation.en: CDC's now making their way into the building.
translation.zh: 疾控中心的人正在进入大楼

translation.en: There are security measures in place.
translation.zh: 他们装备了非常严密的安全设施

translation.en: We still have no idea what's happening.
translation.zh: 我们仍然不知道发生了什么事

translation.en: From the look of the precaution that they're taking...
translation.zh: 从他们采取的防范措施来看

translation.en: I want you to just keep this area clear.
translation.zh: 我要你清干净这个地方

translation.en: This is blood from my partner here.
He's in the back. This blood is from the second firefighter.
translation.zh: 他在后面，这是第二个消防员的血

translation.en: You, turn it off. Turn it off now.
Okay, everyone here. Everybody here is good.
translation.zh: 好了，这里的所有人都没事

translation.en: The two guys are in the back. That's all we can tell you.
translation.zh: 那两个人在后面我们只能告诉你这些

translation.en: -I don't know anything else right now. -Okay.
Just take me to the injured. Everyone else stays here.
translation.zh: 带我去伤员那儿，其他人都留在这儿

translation.en: They tell us to stay calm, and they come dressed like that?
translation.zh: 他们叫我们保持冷静可他们穿成这样进来？

translation.en: -It's gonna be all right. -What? You honestly believe that?
I'm gonna take samples from both men.
translation.zh: 我要取这两个人的样本

translation.en: Give me the camera, come on.
The other one's got a syringe.
translation.zh: 另一个人手上有注射器

translation.en: He just gave Fletcher a shot.
I think the vet was right.
I think he's taking a brain sample.
The vet's in there. He's still in there.
translation.zh: 兽医在里面，他还在里面

translation.en: -Open the door. -We can't, he's been bitten.
-Come on, let him out. -I'm not infected, you're wrong.
translation.zh: -快，让他出来-我没有被感染，你们弄错了

translation.en: I'm not infected. I'm all right.
-They didn't get me. -What are you talking about?
-Are you sure he's been bitten? -Yes, and I'm not taking any chances.
translation.zh: -你肯定他被咬了？-对，我不会冒险

translation.en: Back away till the infected people have been handcuffed.
translation.zh: 退后，直到被感染的人戴上手铐

translation.en: -Would you get that out of my face? -What happens happens in the open.
translation.zh: -你能把这东西拿开吗？-这事必须公开

translation.en: They have a right to shoot this, okay?
translation.zh: 他们有权力拍下来，好吗？

translation.en: -It's not right. -It would not be right to let him out--
You tell us what's going on.
translation.zh: 能告诉我们怎么回事吗？
-我没有被授权告诉你们…-屁话

translation.en: You left my friend because he tried to kill you.
translation.zh: 因为我朋友试图杀你你把他留在里面

translation.en: -Tell us what you know. -Yeah, okay, goddamn, okay.
translation.zh: -告诉我们你知道什么-行了，见鬼，行了

translation.en: We got a call from a vet who had a sick dog brought in.
translation.zh: 我们接到一个兽医的电话有人带了一只病狗过去

translation.en: They ran the routine tests, it was nothing they'd ever seen before.
translation.zh: 他们做了所有常规测试发现了一些从没见过的东西

translation.en: Then it started attacking the other animals.
translation.zh: 然后它开始攻击其它动物

translation.en: And within an hour, all the injured animals...
translation.zh: 在一个小时之内，所有受伤的动物

translation.en: Yeah. The dog's collar led us to this building.
translation.zh: 狗牌领我们到这座大楼
-她只是得了支气管炎-狗屁支气管炎
-只是支气管炎-我们只是想查清楚

translation.en: Relax, ma'am. Relax. We have to be sure.
translation.zh: 放松点，太太，我们必须要确定

translation.en: Dog spread the infection through his saliva.
That's all she has, just bronchitis.
-Get the girl. -No, get away from her.
-Come on, come on. -No, let me go.
Please, you need to get us out of here.
translation.zh: 求你们了，把我们放出去吧

translation.en: Back away. Calm down, calm down, calm down.
-Her father's sick in bed. -Nobody told me that.
translation.zh: -他卧病在床的父亲-怎么没人告诉我

translation.en: We thought everyone was down here.
translation.zh: 我们以为所有人都下来了

translation.en: Get the girl and inject her with it.
-No, no. -And you, bring everybody down here.
Kathy, we're gonna get her. We're gonna bring her down.
translation.zh: 凯茜，我们会找到她带她下来

translation.en: Slow down, slow down, slow down.
-Where the hell's the old lady? -The old lady's gone.
Okay. Just take it easy, okay?
Oh, I think she's in here, Jake.
She's over there. She's over there.
Now, I need you to give me your hand, okay?
Oh, they're getting out. Run, run!
-Don't leave me. -I'm not gonna leave her.
-Don't leave me. -We have to get out of here.
It's not right! It's not right!
-Come on. -No, no, not that way. This way.
Hurry up, come on. Where are the others?
-Lock it, lock it, lock it! -Hurry up.
Jake, did you find the little girl?
translation.zh: 杰克，你找到小女孩了吗？

translation.en: Who gives a shit about the little girl?
All right. We've lost control of the building.
translation.zh: 这座楼已经失去控制了

translation.en: I don't understand. They were biting her face off.
translation.zh: 我不明白，他们把她的脸咬下来了

translation.en: I don't know what the fuck is happening.
translation.zh: 我不知道这究竟是怎么回事？

translation.en: We could all be infected by now. We gotta get out of here.
translation.zh: 我们都有可能被感染我们得离开这里

translation.en: -I'm not moving. -Hey, we wait here, we wait here.
-We have to get out of here. -Listen.
We have to stay here and wait till somebody come and get us.
translation.zh: 我们得呆在这儿等有人来救我们出去

translation.en: They're not gonna come and get us.
-Oh, yes, they will. -They are not gonna come!
They don't give a shit about us! They're gonna let us die!
translation.zh: 他们根本不在乎我们，他们由我们去死

translation.en: It's not gonna hold him for long.
Hey, hey, hey, you're not gonna fucking touch her.
We gotta get out. Gotta get out.
translation.zh: 我们要出去，我们要出去

translation.en: Gotta get out of here. Gotta get out of here. Come on.
translation.zh: 我要出去，我要出去，快啊

translation.en: Help me get out of here.
Let me get out of here, please.
translation.zh: 求求你们，让我离开这里

translation.en: They're not gonna let us out of here alive, are they?
translation.zh: 他们不让我们活着离开这儿，是吧？

translation.en: Jake, there might be a way out.
How? How do we get out of here?
translation.zh: 怎样？我们怎么离开这儿？

translation.en: There is a drain cover in the basement that joins up with the sewers.
translation.zh: 地下室有一个排水渠盖，连着下水道

translation.en: -We need the key, we need the key. -The keys are in our apartment.
translation.zh: -我们需要钥匙-钥匙在公寓里

translation.en: Come with us! You have to come with us!
translation.zh: 跟我们走，你得跟我们走

translation.en: I won't leave him. I can't leave him.
We have to get out of here! We have to get the key.
translation.zh: 我们得离开这里我们得弄到钥匙

translation.en: Key's in Yuri's apartment. Know where he lives?
translation.zh: 钥匙在尤里的公寓知道他住哪吗？

translation.en: You made the list of residents. Where does he live?
translation.zh: 你收集了居民名单，他住哪儿？

translation.en: I can't remember where it's at.
You have to think about it. Think, think, think.
translation.zh: 你得好好想想，快想快想

translation.en: I don't know which apartment. I don't know which apartment it is.
-Grab the hammer. -I got it, I got it.
Oh, keep moving, man. Keep moving.
Where is it? Which one is it?
It should run on auxiliary power. We're good.
translation.zh: 可以靠辅助电力，能行的

translation.en: She's cuffed. We can get by.
translation.zh: 她戴了手铐，我们能过去

translation.en: But it's gonna stop at two. We're gonna stop at two!
translation.zh: 它会在二楼停的，我们会在二楼停

translation.en: Come on. Come on, you should get that hammer, Jake.
translation.zh: 快点，杰克，你要拿着锤子

translation.en: They won't close. They won't close.
No, you haven't. I saw it.
Angie, Angie, they didn't get you. You didn't get bitten.
-Look at me, Angie. Come on, baby. -No!
-Baby, come on, look at me. -Man, let's go.
translation.zh: -宝贝，看着我，看着我-我们走吧

translation.en: You did not get bit. Look at me.
-I saw it, I saw it. -We have to go.
Come on. Come on! Let's go.
This is 3B right here. Right here.
-Keep the light on my hands, Scott. -Okay.
-Find them. -I don't see it, I don't see.
-The light, the light, the light. -I'm bringing it back to you.
No, no, he wouldn't leave them in there.
translation.zh: 他不会把它们放在这儿

translation.en: Hey, he wouldn't leave them in there.
I got them, but I don't know which one it is.
translation.zh: 我找到了，但不知道是哪把

translation.en: -Which one is it, Scott? -Take them all.
Angela, Angela, I need you to be quiet.
translation.zh: 安吉拉，安吉拉，你得安静点

translation.en: We need to get three flights of stairs down to the basement, okay?
translation.zh: 我们要下三层楼到达地下室

translation.en: I need you to stay tight.
I need you to stay close and stay fast, okay?
translation.zh: 紧紧跟着我，保持速度，好吗？

translation.en: -Are you ready? All right, all right. -Yeah, yeah, yeah.
-All right, we can do this. -Got it.
Scott, come on. Come on, Scott.

translation.zh: 安吉拉, 安吉拉, 停下

translation.en: Hey, we gotta go up. Come on.
-Gonna be an old one. Oh, God. -Go.
-It's gotta be an old one, Scott. -I know, pick the key.
translation.zh: -斯考特，应该是旧的-我知道，选一把钥匙

translation.en: -I'm finding it, I'm finding it! -Come on.
-Turn the light on. -It'll come back on.
-I need the light on! -It will come back on.
There we go, there we go, there we go. Okay? Okay, listen.
I think they went away. Oh, damn, damn.
Okay, so this place was locked up.
What that means, probably, is there ain't nobody in here. No one.
Yeah, let's find a way out.
Oh, what is this place, Scott?
-Oh, please, keep the light on. -I got you, I got you.
translation.zh: -求你让灯亮着-我知道，我知道

translation.en: Stay with me. Stay with me.
Oh, God. Oh, it's all the same kind of stuff.
Oh, God, let's get out of here, please.
translation.zh: 求你了，我们离开这儿吧

translation.en: Okay, come on. Come on, grab my hand.
Grab my hand, it's me, it's me. Look at it, look at it.
translation.zh: 抓住我的手，是我是我，看着它

translation.en: Just come around this pole. Let me lead.
translation.zh: 绕到杆子这边来，我来带路

translation.en: Let me lead. I'm right with you.
That's the way, okay? Okay, come on.
Hey, hey, my bad, my bad.
We're gonna have to go through that door.
I just need you to open it.
You're gonna let me look in first.
Just push it and stand back.
Come on, come on, Angie. Angie, let's go in there.
-Please, get the light on me, okay? -Come on.
Oh, this is so fucked. I don't know.
Oh, shit, stick with me, stick with me. Come on.
translation.zh: 紧跟着我，紧跟着我，过来

translation.en: -Keep the light on, keep the light on. -What is it?
What is it? What the hell?
Who is this? Who is this?
I don't know what to do with it.
Oh, God, oh, God, oh, God.
Come on. We don't know what's up there.
translation.zh: 过来，我们不知道那上面是什么

translation.en: Okay, I'm gonna take the camera.
translation.zh: 好的，我要去拿着摄像机

translation.en: Listen to me, listen to me. I'm gonna take the camera.
-I'm gonna take a look up there. -No, no.
We can't stay the fuck down here. We can't stay here.
I won't have a light if you go up there!
translation.zh: 你放上去我就看不到光了

translation.en: -Angie, Angie, stay with me. -I'll be in the dark!
translation.zh: -安吉，安吉，听我说-周围会变黑的

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna have to take this light off you.
Here, grab my waist. Okay, just grab my waist.
-Oh, something hit the camera. -Don't turn it off, fix it.
translation.zh: -有东西打了摄像机-别关掉它，修好它

translation.en: Look, I'm gonna put the night vision on.
translation.zh: 听着，我要打开夜视模式

translation.en: I'll put the night vision on. Hold on.
translation.zh: 我会打开夜视模式，等等

translation.en: Okay. Okay, I can see you now, okay?
Yeah, yeah. Okay, I'm gonna stick my hand out, okay?
Hey, it's me, it's me, it's me, okay?
Okay, good. Come on, come on.
Hey, you're doing good. Come around.
Come around my back. Hold on.
Hold on. We'll be okay, okay?
translation.zh: 撑住，我们会没事的，好吗？

translation.en: I just gotta find us a way out of here.
I'll find a way out, I promise.
translation.zh: 我会找到路出去，我保证

translation.en: What's that? Stay still, stay still.
Don't make a sound. Don't make a sound.
If it can't hear us, it won't find us.
translation.zh: 如果它听不到我们，就不会发现我们

translation.en: Okay, get ready. We're gonna try to get by it.
translation.zh: 好的，准备好，我们要从它身边走过
